participant_1.background:
I have a cat named speckles.
My favorite hobby is knitting.
I have two tattoos.
I enjoy shopping.
I work in an office.

participant_2.background:
Spiders scare the life out of me.
My mother raised me by herself while working two jobs.
I always put my left sock on first.
I pray to god for my family every morning.
I have a condition that prevents me from going to high altitudes.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2.
It's nice to meet you, participant_1. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to knit, crochet, and cross stitch. I also enjoy reading and shopping.
That's cool! I like to knit too. What's your favorite thing to knit?
I love to knit hats and scarves. I'm also working on a sweater right now.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to make a sweater, but I'm not sure I'm brave enough.
It's not as hard as it looks! There are lots of great tutorials online.
Maybe I'll give it a try.
I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks! What else do you like to do?
I love to watch movies and TV shows. I'm also a big fan of music.
Me too! What are some of your favorite movies and TV shows?
I love all kinds of movies, but my favorite genre is probably comedy. I'm also a big fan of science fiction and fantasy.
I love those genres too! What are some of your favorite movies?
Some of my favorite movies include "The Princess Bride", "The Lord of the Rings", and "The Matrix".
Those are all great movies! I love "The Princess Bride".
Me too! It's such a classic.
What are some of your favorite TV shows?
I love a lot of different TV shows, but my favorites include "The Office", "The Simpsons", and "Game of Thrones".
I love those shows too! I'm a big fan of "The Office" and "Game of Thrones".
Me too! They're both so good.
I'm glad we have similar tastes in movies and TV shows.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
